allowComparingNullableBooleansToFalse.description: Whether to allow comparisons between nullable boolean variables and `false`.

allowComparingNullableBooleansToTrue.description: Whether to allow comparisons between nullable boolean variables and `true`.

allowRuleToRunWithoutStrictNullChecksIKn.description: Unless this is set to `true`, the rule will error on every file whose `tsconfig.json` does _not_ have the `strictNullChecks` compiler option (or `strict`) set to `true`.
